title: SLUMDOG!
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Yeah, yeah, teraz by chcieli być jak ja
lines.translation: Yeah, yeah, now they want to be like me
lines.grammar: Verbs: być. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Yeah, yeah, now they want to be like me'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Nie raz nie robisz nic, jak ja
lines.translation: You don't do anything like me sometimes
lines.grammar: Verbs: robisz. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You don't do anything like me sometimes'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Mieć sos i taki fit—
lines.translation: Have sauce and such fit—
lines.grammar: Verbs: mieć. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Have sauce and such fit—'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Ej, ej, ej (yo)
lines.translation: Hey, hey, hey (yo)
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Hey, hey, hey (yo)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Dawaj mi klucze do miasta, bo jak wracam tam, to czuję się jak Slumdog
lines.translation: Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.
lines.grammar: Verbs: dawaj, wracam (prefix w- affects meaning), tam. Prepositions/case: do + genitive (toward). Meaning: 'Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Nie śmigam na pieszo, lecz z daleka słychać warkot
lines.translation: I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar
lines.grammar: Verbs: śmigam, słychać. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on); z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Za mną kordon na rowerach i ktoś jedzie rafką
lines.translation: Behind me there is a cordon of bikes and someone is riding a raft
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'Behind me there is a cordon of bikes and someone is riding a raft'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Zatrzymują mnie na światłach i chcą fotkę — mówię: "bardzo proszę"
lines.translation: They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."
lines.grammar: Verbs: fotkę, mówię, proszę. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Wjeżdżam w tę alejkę, co łączy się z moim blokiem
lines.translation: I enter this alley that connects with my block
lines.grammar: Verbs: wjeżdżam (prefix w- affects meaning), alejkę, się. Prepositions/case: w/we + acc (into) / loc (in); z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'I enter this alley that connects with my block'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Idzie młody, a ja idę o stówę, że niesie koper (smoke)
lines.translation: Here comes the young one, and I bet he's carrying some smoke
lines.grammar: Verbs: idę, stówę. Prepositions/case: o + loc/acc depending on phrase. Meaning: 'Here comes the young one, and I bet he's carrying some smoke'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Tam, gdzie po tej bibie spałem, zbudowali hotel
lines.translation: Where I slept after that party, they built a hotel
lines.grammar: Verbs: tam, spałem. Prepositions/case: po + loc/acc. Meaning: 'Where I slept after that party, they built a hotel'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Sprawdzam zmiany na osiedlu jak jebany deweloper (oh)
lines.translation: I'm checking the changes in the estate like a fucking developer (oh)
lines.grammar: Verbs: sprawdzam. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'I'm checking the changes in the estate like a fucking developer (oh)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: I nas wyganiali z dachu, bo mieli to za głupotę
lines.translation: And they threw us off the roof because they thought it was stupid.
lines.grammar: Verbs: głupotę. Prepositions/case: z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'And they threw us off the roof because they thought it was stupid.'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Ale jak wyganiali mnie wtedy, nie wiedzieli, że jestem kotem
lines.translation: But when they were throwing me out, they didn't know I was a cat.
lines.grammar: Verbs: jestem, kotem. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But when they were throwing me out, they didn't know I was a cat.'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Teraz ich dzieci do szkoły mówią: "mamo, proszę do tej"
lines.translation: Now their children go to school saying: "Mom, please go to this one"
lines.grammar: Verbs: proszę. Prepositions/case: do + genitive (toward). Meaning: 'Now their children go to school saying: "Mom, please go to this one"'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: No bo Jeżyk dał tam płytę, która pokryła się złotem (wow)
lines.translation: Well, because Jeżyk released an album there that went gold (wow)
lines.grammar: Verbs: tam, płytę, się. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Well, because Jeżyk released an album there that went gold (wow)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Ja, teraz by chcieliby być jak ja
lines.translation: Me, now they would like to be like me
lines.grammar: Verbs: być. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Me, now they would like to be like me'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Nie raz nie robić nic, jak ja
lines.translation: More than once do nothing, like me
lines.grammar: Verbs: robić. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'More than once do nothing, like me'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.translation: Have sauce and be as fit as me
lines.grammar: Verbs: mieć. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Have sauce and be as fit as me'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: A wiesz, nie chcieli—
lines.translation: And you know, they didn't want—
lines.grammar: Verbs: wiesz (prefix w- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'And you know, they didn't want—'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Właśnie mijam dupę — ona mnie nie chciała, też jej nie chcę teraz
lines.translation: I'm just passing by the ass - she didn't want me, I don't want her now either
lines.grammar: Verbs: mijam, dupę, chcę. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I'm just passing by the ass - she didn't want me, I don't want her now either'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Ale wtedy bym się pociął za nią, zmienił et cetera
lines.translation: But then I would cut myself for her, change her, etc.
lines.grammar: Verbs: się. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But then I would cut myself for her, change her, etc.'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Śmiała się z tych portków i mnie miała za pozera
lines.translation: She laughed at those pants and thought I was a poseur.
lines.grammar: Verbs: się. Prepositions/case: z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'She laughed at those pants and thought I was a poseur.'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: A na trasie coś pisała, czy na backstage ją zabieram? (Woo)
lines.translation: Did she write anything on the tour, should I take her backstage? (Woo)
lines.grammar: Verbs: zabieram (prefix z- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'Did she write anything on the tour, should I take her backstage? (Woo)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Ty, a ta z pierwszej ławki była spoko niby (taa)

lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'You, and the one in the first row was kind of cool (yeah)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Po lekcjach paliła hajs, z Maroko niby
lines.translation: After classes she smoked cash, supposedly from Morocco
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: po + loc/acc; z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'After classes she smoked cash, supposedly from Morocco'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Co by nie mówić — zawsze miała jakieś perspektywy
lines.translation: Whatever you say, she always had some prospects

lines.text: Zwołaj tu każdego, kto tu był — ja będę bandą
